Package gw.api.databuilder

Class ActivityPatternBuilder

java.lang.Object
gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<ActivityPattern,ActivityPatternBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.CCDataBuilder<ActivityPattern,ActivityPatternBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.ActivityPatternBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DelegateDataBuilder<ActivityPattern>, ValueGenerator<ActivityPattern>
public class ActivityPatternBuilder extends CCDataBuilder<ActivityPattern,ActivityPatternBuilder>

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder

    DEFAULT_ORDER

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ActivityPatternBuilder
    uiReadyGeneralTaskActivityPatternBuilder()
    Creates a UI ready activity pattern of "general" type and "task" class with all the required fields set: Subject - a unique string starting with "Subject" Code - a unique string starting with "Code" Mandatory - false AutomatedOnly - false ClosedClaimAvlble - false Recurring - false Priority - random Priority typecode Importance - random ImportanceLevel typecode Note that if you set the TargetIncludeDays to IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS then TargetBusCalType becomes required and you must specify a value.
    ActivityPatternBuilder
    withActivityClass(ActivityClass activityClass)
    Sets the class of the activity.

    Sets the true if the activity pattern is used only by automated additions to the workplan.

    Sets the category used to organize the activity pattern.

    Sets the used to optionally filter activity patterns by claim loss type.

    Sets the true if the activity pattern is available for closed claims.

    Sets the concise name of the activity pattern, used to identify the pattern within rules.

    Sets the escalation business calendar type (used only if EscalationInclDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).

  • Constructor Details

    • ActivityPatternBuilder

      public ActivityPatternBuilder()
      Creates a new ActivityPatternBuilder

  • Method Details

    • uiReadyGeneralTaskActivityPatternBuilder

      public static ActivityPatternBuilder uiReadyGeneralTaskActivityPatternBuilder()
      Creates a UI ready activity pattern of "general" type and "task" class with all the required fields set:
      • Subject - a unique string starting with "Subject"
      • Code - a unique string starting with "Code"
      • Mandatory - false
      • AutomatedOnly - false
      • ClosedClaimAvlble - false
      • Recurring - false
      • Priority - random Priority typecode
      • Importance - random ImportanceLevel typecode
      Note that if you set the TargetIncludeDays to IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS then TargetBusCalType becomes required and you must specify a value. Likewise if you set EscalationIncludeDays to IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS then EscalationBusCalType becomes required.
      Returns:
      the builder

    • withActivityClass

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withActivityClass(ActivityClass activityClass)
      Sets the class of the activity.
      Parameters:
      activityClass - the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withAutomatedOnly

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withAutomatedOnly(boolean automatedOnly)
      Sets the true if the activity pattern is used only by automated additions to the workplan. If true, the pattern won't be shown as an option for users to choose in the application's interface.
      Parameters:
      automatedOnly - the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withCategory

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withCategory(ActivityCategory category)
      Sets the category used to organize the activity pattern.
      Parameters:
      category - the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withClaimLossType(LossType claimLossType)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • withEscalationBusCalTypeCompanyHolidays

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeCompanyHolidays()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Company Holidays" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withEscalationBusCalTypeGeneral

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeGeneral()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "General" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withEscalationBusCalTypeFederalHolidays

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeFederalHolidays()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Federal Holidays" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withEscalationBusCalTypeLossLocation

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeLossLocation()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Claim Loss Location" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). NOTE the display string for this type will always be in English regardless of the locale of the server. See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withEscalationBusCalType

      public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalType(BusCalType busCalType)
      Sets the escalation business calendar type (used only if EscalationInclDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
      Parameters:
      busCalType - the BusCalType value
      Returns:
      the modified builder
